column8: what if there is no such formula in the first place....MCA today urged the government to disclose the formula on fuel price calculation to prevent the opposition from misleading the public.Publicity bureau deputy chairperson Lau Chin Kok said the government needs to handle the fuel price increase issue in an open and transparent manner, so that the opposition "will not have a chance to distort the facts"."After the recent increase in fuel prices, the public may start to believe hearsay. This will eventually lead the whole issue to be spun out of control."There are opposition leaders disguised as experts and give irresponsible comments. This has caused great harm to the government," Lau claimed in a press statement.Read more: https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/371294#ixzz4XbGelg5s
